refnamediv.refpurpose: A C gateway function which returns the various variables.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: ReturnArguments(pvApiCtx) will return the various variables declared through AssignOutputVariable(pvApiCtx, X).

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: This example takes a matrix of doubles as input and returns:

listitem.para: the number of lines (first output argument)
the number of rows (second output argument)
